bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Implementing an IEC 61850 Based Substation Communications, Protection, Monitoring and Control System
IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Implementing an IEC 61850 Based Substation Communications, Protection, Monitoring and Control System

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This recommended practice outlines the steps and procedures a user should undertake to implement an IEC 61850 substation in both a single and multi-vendor equipment environment. The recommended practice addresses intelligent electronic device (IED) specification, procurement, configuration, and documentation to develop a general design philosophy that transforms the IEC 61850 standard using this as a practical working implementation guide. This recommended practice gives a general overview of an IEC 61850 implementation. Future work may develop more detail behind the topics presented herein.
